text: Lomnitz may refer to: ==People== *Cinna Lomnitz (1925–2016), Chilean-Mexican geophysicist *Claudio Lomnitz, Mexican professor of Anthropology *Larissa Adler Lomnitz (1932-2019), French-born Chilean-Mexican social anthropologist, researcher, professor, and academic ==Places== *Lomnitz, the German name of some inhabited places: ** Lomnice (disambiguation) (Czech language) ** Łomnica (disambiguation) (Polish language)
title: Lomnitz
